name: Holiday Inn Express Brookpark - Cleveland Airport

reviews.text: Pros: Close to Cleveland Hopkins Airport, free breakfast.
reviews.title: Not the best HIE

reviews.text: Cons: Made me wait when I arrived as there was no one at the desk for a few minutes (I could hear talking in the back room but there was no bell), bed was not as comfy as I’ve found elsewhere at HIE, refrigerator compressor so loud I unplugged it, there was a coffee pot in the room but they neglected to leave me any coffee, no guide in room for television stations, and the parking lot was a mess (hoping they were preparing to repave). There were two almost identical lamps in the room; one on bedside stand and the other on the desk. Desk lamp had electric outlets built in – bedside did not. Why buy two styles?...most everyone has electronics they need to plug in bedside! I switched them (wonder if they noticed?).
reviews.title: Nice hotel with reliable Holiday Inn service

reviews.text: This was a good hotel and reliable like other Holiday Inn Express's.
reviews.title: Good price, helpful friendly staff

reviews.text: It has a nice pool. The breakfast was a little smaller then many other Holiday Inn Express's that I have been to.
reviews.title: Poor night's sleep

reviews.text: The staff was very friendly.
reviews.title: Friendly staff

reviews.text: We stay at Holiday Inn Express locations quite a bit and the staff at this hotel was anything but helpful. When we checked in they seemed put out to check us in. After checking out we realized that one of the rooms we paid for was charged a higher rate than what was booked. When we called the hotel they told us there was nothing they could do. To me this is bad business especially since the area this hotel is located in is less than desirable and the hotel itself isn't worth the money you will spend. The rooms have a weird smell to them and the hotel lobby smells like cat urine. We definitely will NOT be staying here again on our way through Cleveland over the next few months.
reviews.title: Terrible customer service...Charged higher rate than booked!

reviews.text: The hotel location is a no brainer if you want to stay near the airport. Since I was visiting on government business they honored the government rate making it a great value. Not a whole lot of options close by if you want to get something to eat, but the staff can offer suggestions. The rooms are what you would expect, clean and comfortable. My room needed some minor repairs, but nothing that would keep me away. Nice down to earth staff.
reviews.title: Great stay, close to the airport, friendly staff.

reviews.text: I recently stayed at this Holiday Inn Express and was a little apprehensive as it is being remodeled. However, I was extremely pleased. The staff was so wonderful and the work at the hotel looks to be almost complete. My room was clean and comfortable and the free breakfast is an added bonus. When traveling out of Cleveland Hopkins Airport I will definitely use this hotel again and again.
reviews.title: Great Airport Hotel

reviews.text: I have read some negative reviews on this place but we took a chance anyway. Yes there is some minor upgrading to the building but the rooms were very clean, the staff was exceptionally nice and helpful. Free Breakfast was great. We would surely stay there again.
reviews.title: Clean and Friendly

reviews.text: The staff was very friendly and helpful in booking my reservation and made sure I was getting the best rate. The location is wonderful as it is right near the airport. Easy access to shopping and restaurants. Room location was very quiet. A terrific full breakfast included. The renovation looks to be coming along nicely. Will be excited to stay again and see the finished results! If you are looking for a hotel in this area, I would very much recommend this one!
reviews.title: A must stay hotel close to airport!

reviews.text: My stay was comfortable and relaxing. The staff are friendly and were quick to correct a booking error so my credit card was not charged an incorrect amount. The construction looks to be complete and the upgrades have made it like a new hotel. I would suggest this location to friends and family and the hotel is very close to the Airport for our of town guests.
reviews.title: Hotel Stay

reviews.text: While not Luxurious, it was a comfortable large room, serviceable bathroom, close to the airport. The staff was very friendly and helpful. The heater was only a little too loud.
reviews.title: Friendly, comfortable, convenient

reviews.text: The lighting is inadequate, especially when both of us wanted to read in bed.
reviews.title: Under construction

reviews.text: WiFi free and eazy.
reviews.title: Will Stay Again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast all carb - but there is a restaurant across the street.
reviews.title: Super Disappointed

reviews.text: Stayed here on April 27th I had a 2 queen bed with fridge and micro. Room was beautiful and very clean! I originally was going to book my reservation through Expedia, they showed the hotel had a pool and hot tub, but I ended up just going straight to the Holiday Inn website and made my reservation. I had placed a few phone calls to the hotel before Arrival, and Raj was extremely nice and very helpful. When arriving at the hotel my check in was fast and the lady was very courteous. I was disappointed when i found out they do not have the hot tub anymore that it was taken out during their reconstruction. the air conditioning unit in 209 was not strong and the windows did not open so my room was sort of hot but wasnt too uncomfortable. the pool was relaxing. The breakfast was great!!! I was extremely surprised at the variety. I was expecting cereal, or a muffin, maybe a bagel, coffee and juice. No they had the whole shebang! Eggs, biscuits and gravy, sausage, cereal, muffins, bagels, toast, pastries, pancakes, everything!
reviews.title: Great Stay! Very Nice Hotel!

reviews.text: This hotel is conveniently close to Cleland Hopkins Airport. There is a board that gives flight information-in the lobby. Rooms are spacious and clean. The breakfast is great and hotel personnel very helpful!
reviews.title: Clean hotel that gives flight info. and has a great breakfast!

reviews.text: Stayed at this hotel because of low internet pricing and proximity to airport. Mistake. The bathroom was in horrible condition: bath stopper did not work and toilet did not flush. I would not stay again.
reviews.title: No.

reviews.text: Newly remodeled rooms/floor very nice. Friendly helpful staff. A bit noisy cooling system and close by traffic. Unfortunately there was no hot water in the room due to a computer glitch - but we were offered a discount. All in all good stay for the price.
reviews.title: Nicely redone Holiday Inn Express

reviews.text: Room was clean and adequate. Pool was great. Needed rooms cleaned early for arriving guests. Housekeeping cheerfully cleaned rooms early.
reviews.title: Great service

aka: Holiday Inn Express Brookpark - Cleveland Airport Hotel
description: Welcome to the Holiday Inn Express Brookpark/Cleveland Hopkins Airport hotel. We are conveniently located 1 mile from the airport, 4 miles from the IX Center, and 4 miles from car rental facilities. Our free shuttle runs from 6 AM to midnight daily. The Holiday Inn Express hotel features include complimentary hot breakfast bar, free high-speed Internet access, and free local phone calls. Enjoy a unique breakfast experience at our new Express Start breakfast bar served every morning featuring a selection of fruits, juices, cereals, breads/pastries, and even hard-boiled eggs. We have also created the world's best tasting cinnamon roll. Visit Brookpark, OH and Stay Smart at the Holiday Inn Express hotel while attending the following IX Center events: World Alpaca Owners & Breeders Association National Conference June 3-7National Sports Collectors Convention July 29-August 2Cleveland Women's Show September 11-13RV Bargain Expo September 11-13Famous Tri State ExpoSeptember 15-16Ohio Accounting ShowSeptember 23-24Midwest Marketing ShowOctober 7-8Oktoberfest October 23-25Fabulous Food Show November 13-15By Hand Fine Arts Show November 13-15Cleveland Christmas Connections November 20-22
